Question: It felt like my fingers doing the stroking were touching similar textures.
The texture of the finger became similar to the texture of paper when I stroked it.
While stroking the paper, it felt very different from stroking the finger.
While stroking the paper, it felt as if its texture was like the texture of the finger.
While stroking the paper, it seemed like I felt bumps with my finger.
While stroking the paper with my finger, I never felt any bumpiness.
